Simplify Skip disappointed woman and the man separated by a door Get rid of confusion with other people Sometimes usual matters of communication doesn\'t work and it’s hard to remain calm and happy...\nThis app will make your words simpler to others Next ellipses, showing current screen, now the first No need to write long texts You don’t have to write even average text blocks, just take a photo of what you need or tell it to voice assistant ellipses, showing current screen, now the second Available for any person Application interface designed to become friendly for any kind of users, even for people with disabilities Get started ellipses, showing current screen, now the third, last of them There will be simplified text Simplify Enter something… LoginActivity Email Password Log in Sign in "Welcome !" Not a valid username, username must be not empty Not a valid email, email should be like letters123@letters.letters Password must be >5 characters "Login failed" Take Photo Start Capture Stop Capture Simplify application icon History separator line three black dots back Select language Forgot passwordf profile icon settings icon English Make photo My profile Your simplification frequency avatar image Change info Name Surname Email Join our community Receive advertisements Log in Already have an account?
